docs.text: Develop Develop Boat-Tracker clients using this JSON API. General Authentication Boat-Tracker uses Google's OAuth 2.0 authentication system. Clients must Obtain an ID token upon successful authentication with Google Deliver the ID token to the Boat-Tracker backend when making authenticated API calls Set the ID token in the Authorization header under the Bearer scheme: Authorization: Bearer google_id_token_goes_here Errors Error responses use the following JSON format: { "errors": [ { "message": "This is an error message." } ] }
docs.title: Develop

docs.text: Develop Boat-Tracker clients using this JSON API.
docs.title: Develop

docs.text: Boat-Tracker uses Google's OAuth 2.0 authentication system. Clients must Obtain an ID token upon successful authentication with Google Deliver the ID token to the Boat-Tracker backend when making authenticated API calls Set the ID token in the Authorization header under the Bearer scheme: Authorization: Bearer google_id_token_goes_here
docs.title: Authentication

docs.text: Error responses use the following JSON format: { "errors": [ { "message": "This is an error message." } ] }
docs.title: Errors

docs.text: Endpoints GET /users/me Returns user information including any boats: { "user": { "id": 123, "username": "jack", "email": "jack@example.com", "boats": [ { "id": 12, "name: "Her Highness", "token": "abc123" } ], "enabled": true } } GET /tracks Returns tracks driven: { "tracks": [ { "track": { "track": 123, "trackName": "abc", "boat": 12, "boatName": "Her Highness", "user": 123, "username": "jack", "points": 42, "duration": 3500, "distance": 1234, "topSpeed": 24.1, "avgSpeed": 23.2, "avgWaterTemp": 6.1, "topPoint": { "id": 123, "coord": { "lng": 60.24, "lat": 24.1 }, "speed": 24.1 } } } ] }
docs.title: HTTP Endpoints
